title: Dealer Dashboard
description: A dashboard that helps users find real cars for sale in their area, providing images, prices, and contact information. Users can filter by brand and model. Built with Next.js for server-side rendering, Tailwind CSS for styling, Firebase for authentication, and MongoDB for data storage. Fully self-hosted.

title: AGPGraphx Website
description: A front-end dashboard currently in use by a sign-making business, built with Next.js for frontend, Tailwind CSS for responsive design, Firebase for authentication, and MongoDB for data storage. Self-hosted on custom infrastructure.
